resources.string: You don’t need to be staying at Maafushi’s Adaaran Club Rannalhi resort to enjoy its facilities. This day trip lets you enjoy the beautiful views, warm water, and food and drink at this stunning resort. You can pay a bit extra to make use of the resort’s kayaking, snorkeling, and windsurfing gear. This trip is for travelers staying on Maafushi island but transfers from other locations may be possible
